title: Hanging, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation; mordants for black, two reds, and lavender were block printed; madder dyed; yellow and blue applied by brush
dimensions: H x W x D: 193 x 139.7 cm (6 ft. 4 in. x 55 in.)
description: Large paisley cone within a shaped niche. Pair of peacocks on either side of a rocky mound. At top, a face and writing.

exhibitions.title: Lockwood de Forest, Frederic Church, and the Passion for the Exotic

tombstone.epitaph:
Hanging, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation; mordants for black, two reds, and lavender were block printed; madder dyed; yellow and blue applied by brush. Gift of Harvey Smith. 1968-135-92.
